data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform you that the officials of our Company will be interacting in-person with the Analyst/Investors as per the details mentioned below:
Day Date & Time  Interaction with Type Mode of meeting/ Location
Tuesday 17th February 2026.
from 9.00 am to 6.00 pm Analysts/ Investors One on one  Physical - Chennai
No Unpublished Price sensitive information pertaining to the company will be shared in any of the meets with Analyst/Institutional Investors. 
The above information is also available on the website of the Company at www.ceigall.com.
Request you to kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Intimation Of Violation Under The CompanyS Code Of Conduct On Prohibition Of Insider Trading Regulations.
data.news_body:
We are submitting herewith the intimation of violation under the Companys Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report Trading by Designated Persons (Code of Conduct) and the action taken by the Company in this regard in compliance with Regulation 9 (1) read with Schedule B of the SEBI PIT Regulations as amended from time to time. 

Please take on record the intimation as per Annexure-A as prescribed under SEBI Master Circular No. SEBI/HO/ISD/ISD-PoD-2/P/CIR/2024/126 dated September 23 2024 issued by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Sub: Schedule for Earnings Call for Ceigall India Limited- Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31 2025.

Dear Sir/Maam

Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (the Listing Regulations) we wish to inform you that the Company is organizing an Earnings Call for analysts and investors on Monday February 09 2026 at 05:00 PM (IST) in respect of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31 2025. Dial in and other details of the Earnings Call are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Monday February 09 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.

In terms of the "Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders" framed pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 amendments made thereunder the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed for all Designated Persons (including their immediate relatives) with effect from January 01 2026 and shall remain closed till 48 hours after the announcement of the above Unaudited Financial Results.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Pursuant To Regulation 29 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 For The Board Meeting To Be Held On Monday February 09 2026.
data.news_body:
Ceigall India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 09/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Monday February 09 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.

In terms of the "Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders" framed pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 amendments made thereunder the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed for all Designated Persons (including their immediate relatives) with effect from January 01 2026 and shall remain closed till 48 hours after the announcement of the above Unaudited Financial Results.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: In accordance with the provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we wish to inform you that Ceigall Infra Projects Private Limited a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company has emerged as the L1 bidder in the financial bid opening for Tender ID: 2025_NHAI_242354_1 dated 21st January 2026 from National Highways Authority of India for Construction of 4 laning of Sahebganj Areraj Bettiah of NH 139W (Total length 78.942 km) in the State of Bihar on Hybrid Annuity Mode comprising (i) Section 1 Sahebganj to Areraj (38.362 km) and (ii) Section 2 Areraj to Bettiah (40.580 km)."

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to inform you that Ceigall India Limited [CIL] jointly with SAM India Builtwell Pvt. Ltd. [SAM] has been declared as L-1 bidder by Jaipur Metro Rail Corporation Ltd in a joint venture bidding. CIL has 74% share and SAM has 26% share in Joint Venture for this project.

data.caption: Agreement With Adfactors PR Private Limited
data.news_body: In continuation of our earlier intimation dated September 17 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 it is hereby informed that Ceigall India Limited has appointed Adfactors PR Private Limited as the Investor Relations agency with effect from January 16 2026.

data.caption: Sub: Intimation Of Receipt Of Arbitration Award Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015-Regulatory Order
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam 

With reference to the above captioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform that Arbitration Award for an Amount of INR 7.71 Crore plus applicable GST has been received in favour of Ceigall India Limited issued by Honble Arbitration Tribunal under Section 31 of the Arbitration and Conciliation Act 1996 dated 13th January 2026 in the matter of Ceigall India Limited - Inderjit Mehta Construction Private Limited (JV) and National Highways Authority of India in relation to the project Rehabilitation and augmentation of New NH-354 (Old SH-25) of section Ramdas to Gurdaspur from design chainage km 140.000 (existing km 46.320 of SH) to design chainage km 187.492 (existing km 3.185 of SH) for length of 47.492 into two lane with paved shoulder/four-lane under Bharatmala scheme in the state of Punjab EPC mode (Package-V

data.caption: Incorporation Of Project SPV Ceigall Indore Ujjain Greenfield Highway Limited
data.news_body: Approved the incorporation of project SPV Ceigall Indore Ujjain Greenfield Highway Limited as subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Execution Of Non-Binding Offer Letter
data.news_body: Considered and authorised execution of Non-binding offer letter received from an Asset Management Company in connection with the sale of 100% equity stake held in Ceigall Malout Abohar Sadhuwali Highways Private Limited a step-down subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Maam 


In continuation of our intimation dated 2nd January 2026 and in accordance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has today entered into Share Purchase Agreement with REC Power Development and Consultancy Limited for acquiring 100% equity shares of Velgaon Power Transmission Limited (VPTL). 

After this acquisition VPTL has become wholly owned subsidiary of Ceigall India Limited.

The disclosures as required under Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations read with SEBI Master Circular dated November 11 2024 and December 31 2024 are given in Annexure A.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30- Incorporation Of A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Company
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated 2nd January 2026 and Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a Wholly Owned Subsidiary of the Company under the provisions of the Companies Act 2013 with the name and style of Ceigall Green Energy MP Limited has been incorporated on 5th January 2026.

data.caption: Incorporation Of Project SPV
data.news_body: The incorporation of project SPV Ceigall Green Energy MP Limited as a Wholly Owned Subsidiary and incorporation of project SPV Ceigall Indore Ujjain Greenfield Highway Limited as step down subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: Signing of Share Purchase Agreement to acquisition 100 % shares of project SPV - Velgaon Power Transmission Limited (VPTL) a Wholly Owned Subsidiary of REC Power Development and Consultancy Limited (REC).

data.caption: Update On Project
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated March 28 2025 and accordance with the provisions of Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to inform you that the project Construction of 4/6 Lane Southern Ayodhya Bypass from Km. 5.000 To Km. 37.172 (starting near Km. 112.540. ending at Km. 153.281 of NH-27) of Total Length of 32.172 Km on HAM Basis Under NHDP Phase-VII in the state of Uttar Pradesh. executed through Ceigall Ayodhya Bypass Private Limited subsidiary of the Company has received a letter dated 31st December 2025 from Independent Engineer (IE) certifying physical progress to tune of 20.09% of the Project highway till 29th December 2025. With this project Milestone I under Schedule G of the Concession Agreement was successfully achieved.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated December 28 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the press release titled Ceigall India Receives LOA for ?1089 Crore Indore-Ujjain Highway Project.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 28th November 2025 we are pleased to inform you that Ceigall Infra Projects Private Limited a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company has received Letter of Award (LOA) dated 27th December 2025 from Madhya Pradesh Road Development Corporation Limited for Construction of Indore Ujjain Green field (Access Control) 4 lane with paved shoulder project highway (length 48.10 Km.) Starting from Km. 0.000 near Pitra Parvat and terminating at Km. 48.100 (Simhastha bypass km 2.600) on Hybrid Annuity Mode (HAM).

data.caption: Receipt Of Provisional Certificate For The Project In The State Of Punjab
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated March 5 2025 and in accordance with the provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to inform you that Ceigall Bathinda Dabwali Highways Private Limited subsidiary of Ceigall India Limited has received the provisional certificate for the project Development of Six-Laning of Jodhpur Romana (Bathinda) - Mandi Dabwali (Punjab/Haryana Border) section of NH-54 from design Ch. 0.000 to design Ch. 27.400 (design length 27.40 km) in the state of Punjab on Hybrid Annuity Mode.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Subject: Closure of Trading Window under SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015
Dear Sir / Madam
Pursuant to Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 as may be amended from time to time and in accordance with the Companys Internal  Code on Prohibition of Insider Trading please be informed that the Trading Window for dealing in the Securities of the Company shall remain closed with effect from January 01 2026 till the completion of 48 hours after the declaration of Financial Results for the Quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025.
The date of Board Meeting for consideration and declaration of said Financial Result will be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: In continuation of our letters dated December 23 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the press release titled Ceigall India Limited Receives LOA for 130 MW Solor Power Projects from MPUVNL under PM KUSUM-C.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 22nd December 2025 we are pleased to inform you that Company has received Multiple Letter of Award (LOA) from Madhya Pradesh Urja Vikas Nigam Ltd. (MPUVNL) for Solar PV based Power Plants (SPP) for solar photovoltaic power generating stations for an aggregate capacity of 130 MW (AC) under the Surya Mitra Krishi Feeders Scheme - PM KUSUM-C for setting up grid-connected solar power projects at 2 districts in the state of Madhya Pradesh.

data.caption: Clarification On Volume Movement
data.news_body:
A. Similar clarification regarding trading volume was sought by the National Stock Exchange of India Limited vide its e-mail dated December 19 2025 which was duly replied to by the Company vide its letter dated December 20 2025. A copy of the same is enclosed herewith as Annexure 1.
B. Based on the information available today on the e-procurement portal (public domain of govt. authority) certain confirmation of work order to the Company (L1 declaration by Madhya Pradesh Urja Vikas Nigam Limited) are available for public view. However the Company has not yet received any official communication in the form of a Letter of Award in this regard. The relevant disclosure as applicable has already been made available to Stock Exchanges. A copy is enclosed as Annexure 2.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We are pleased to inform you that Company has emerged as L1 Bidder in the financial bid by Madhya Pradesh Urja Vikas Nigam Ltd. (MPUVNL) for Solar PV based Power Plants (SPP) for solar photovoltaic power generating stations of an aggregate capacity of 130 MW (AC) under the Surya Mitra Krishi Feeders Scheme - PM KUSUM-C for setting up grid-connected solar power projects at 2 districts in the state of Madhya Pradesh.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Ceigall India Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Ceigall India Ltd on December 22 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Considered And Approved The Incorporation Of: - A Wholly Owned Subsidiary (WOS) In Singapore And A Step-Down Subsidiary In Dubai United Arab Emirates.
data.news_body:
Considered and approved the incorporation of:
1. A Wholly Owned Subsidiary (WOS) in Singapore and
2. A Step-Down Subsidiary in Dubai United Arab Emirates.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (the Listing Regulations) we wish to inform you that the Company is organizing an Earnings Call for analysts and investors on Tuesday November 11 2025 at 16:00 hours IST in respect of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.  Dial in and other details of the Earnings Call are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Pursuant To Regulation 29 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 For The Board Meeting To Be Held On Tuesday November 11 2025.
data.news_body:
Ceigall India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 11/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday November 11 2025 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.
In terms of the "Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders" framed pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 amendments made thereunder the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed for all Designated Persons (including their immediate relatives) with effect from October 01 2025 and shall remain closed till 48 hours after the announcement of the above Unaudited Financial Results.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday November 11 2025 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.
In terms of the "Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders" framed pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 amendments made thereunder the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed for all Designated Persons (including their immediate relatives) with effect from October 01 2025 and shall remain closed till 48 hours after the announcement of the above Unaudited Financial Results.

data.caption: Incorporation Of A Wholly Owned Subsidiaries
data.news_body:
We refer to our letter dated October 16 2025 wherein we informed you about the approval for the incorporation of a Wholly Owned Subsidiaries of the Company. We would like to further update you that the Wholly Owned Subsidiaries of the Company are Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) have been incorporated on October 29 2025 under the provisions of the Companies Act 2013 with the name and style of -
1. Ceigall Green Energy MH1 Limited.
2. Ceigall Green Energy MH2 Limited.

data.caption: Intimation Of Financial Close For Project - Ceigall Southern Ludhiana Bypass Private Limited
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/ Maam

In Continuation to our letter dated 05th May 2025 and Pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (LODR) 2015 We wish to inform you that Ceigall Southern Ludhiana Bypass Private Limited a Subsidiary of the Company has received a letter dated 22nd October 2025 from the NHAI Confirming the noting of financial close.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 - Incorporation Of Wholly Owned Subsidiary
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations we wish to inform you that in accordance with the powers conferred by the Board of Directors of Ceigall India Limited (the Company) the Management Committee of the Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. October  16 2025 has approved the incorporation of two Wholly Owned Subsidiary of the Company under the provisions of the Companies Act 2013 being Special Purpose Vehicle(SPV) with the name and style of:
A. Ceigall Green Energy MH1 Limited and 
B. Ceigall Green Energy MH2 Limited.

data.news_body: In continuation of our letters dated October 10 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 Please find enclosed the Press Release titled Ceigall India Secures ?6.61 Crore Arbitration Award from Arbitral Tribunal.

data.caption: Intimation Of Receipt Of Arbitration Award Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015-Regulatory Order
data.news_body: With reference to the above captioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we would hereby like to inform the Stock Exchange that Arbitration Award for an Amount of INR. 6.61 Crore has been received in favour of Ceigall India Limited issued by Honourable Arbitral Tribunal under Section 31 of the Arbitration and Conciliation Act 1996 dated 09-10-2025 in the matter of Ceigall India Limited and Punjab Public Works Department Ludhiana in relation to the project Construction of Internal Roads Estate Public Health Services & Campus Lighting Interim Airport Terminal at Halwara IAF Station (EPC Mode) Distt: Ludhiana (Punjab).

MUFG Intime India Private Limited (Formally known as Link Intime India Private Limited) Registrar and Share Transfer Agent (RTA) of the Company as per Regulation 74(5) of the SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended 30th September 2025.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 07th  September 2025 intimating receipt of the Letter of Intent for the project under  LoI # 2:MSKVY 2.0/ROUND 2 for Procurement of Solar Power under Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 for 147 MW and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to inform you that Company has received Letter of Award dated 02nd  October 2025 from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Co. Ltd. for Solar Power Developer (SPD) for solar photovoltaic power generating stations of an aggregate capacity of 147 MW (AC) under the Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 Scheme for setting up grid-connected solar power projects at 2 districts in the state of Maharashtra.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 07th  September 2025 intimating receipt of the Letter of Intent for the project under Lot #1 MSKVY 2.0/ROUND 1 for procurement of solar power under Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 for 190 MW and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to inform you that Company has received Letter of Award dated 02nd  October 2025 from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Co. Ltd. for Solar Power Developer (SPD) for solar photovoltaic power generating stations of an aggregate capacity of 190 MW (AC) under the Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 Scheme for setting up grid-connected solar power projects at 4 Districts in the state of Maharashtra.

data.caption: Intimation Of Declaration Of Appointed Date For The Project
data.news_body: In accordance with the Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to inform you that Ceigall Ludhiana Bathina Greenfield Highway Private Limited a subsidiary of the Company has received a letter dated 27th September 2025 from National Highways Authority of India notifying 29th September 2025 as the Appointed Date for the Project.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 12th September 2025 regarding Companys emergence as the L1 bidder for the project as mentioned hereunder and in accordance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we are pleased to inform you that CIL-JSPPPL (JV) [ Joint Venture between Ceigall India Limited (CIL) and JSP projects Pvt. Ltd (JSPPPL) constituted with CIL holding 80% share and JSPPPL holding 20% share.) has received Letter of Award (i.e.. Letter for Approval of allotment of Work) dated 24th September 2025 from Greater Mohali Area Development Authority (GMADA) for the Construction of Internal Road of Pocket B C & D of Aerotropolis S.A.S Nagar (Civil Public Health and Elect. Works).

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 as may be amended from time to time and in accordance with the Companys Code on Prohibition of Insider Trading we wish to inform you that the Trading Window for dealing in the Securities of the Company shall remain closed for declaration of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and half year ending September 30 2025 with effect from October 01 2025 till the end of 48 hours after the declaration of the said Financial Results to the Stock Exchanges where the securities of the Company are listed.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III Part A of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI LODR Regulations) We are pleased to inform you that our Company has emerged as the Lowest (L-1) Bidder in auction Establishment of Grid-Connected Ground-Mounted Solar Photovoltaic (PV) Project with Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) at Morena Solar Park Madhya Pradesh through a tariff-based competitive bidding. The Company has quoted a tariff of ?2.70/kWh in the electronic (online) reverse auction held on 19.09.2025. At the said quoted tariff the Company has been announced lowest bidder with a capacity of 220 MW out of the total 440 MW project capacity Invited by Rewa Ultra Mega Solar Limited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: Board in its meeting today also approved providing security for the Rupee Term Loan facility sanctioned to Ceigall Southern Ludhiana Bypass Private Limited SPV and making investment in its share capital to finance the project of the SPV.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: This is in continuation of our earlier communications dated March 29 2025 regarding the Inter-Corporate Deposit (ICD) from Ceigall Infra Projects Private Limited (CIPPL) a Wholly Owned Subsidiary (WOS) of the Company to C & C Constructions Limited (CCCL) and May 15 2025 concerning the proposed merger of CIPPL with CCCL.

data.caption: Appointment Of Investor Relation Agency
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has executed an engagement letter with Ernst & Young LLP for the provision of Investor Relations Consulting Services with immediate effect.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III Part A of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI LODR Regulations) We are pleased to inform you that our Company has emerged as L1 bidder in Financial Bid Opening for the following tender invited by Greater Mohali Area Development Authority (GMADA).

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: In terms of the "Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders" framed pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 amendments made thereunder the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed for all Designated Persons (including their immediate relatives) with effect from the closure of the Business hours i.e. September 12 2025 till 48 hours after conclusion of the Board Meeting.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Be Held On Thursday 18Th September 2025
data.news_body:
Ceigall India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 18/09/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In continuation of our intimation dated May 15 2025 in terms of Regulation 29 & 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 [SEBI (LODR)] please be informed that a Meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled to be held on Thursday 18th September 2025 inter-alia to consider and discuss  developments relating to the Scheme of Arrangement of Ceigall Infra Projects Private Limited (a wholly owned subsidiary of Ceigall India Limited) with C & C Construction Limited and to take further necessary decisions in this regard.

In terms of the "Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders" framed pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 .

data.news_body: In continuation of our letters dated September 7 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 Please find enclosed the Press Release titled Ceigall enters Renewable Energy Space Secures 337 MW Lols from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Co. Limited (MSEDCL) for procurement of Solar Power.

data.caption: Letter Of Intent For Procurement Of Solar Power Under Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 For 147 MW.
data.news_body: With reference to the above captioned subject and pursuant to the Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has received a Letter of Intent under LoI # 2:MSKVY 2.0/ROUND 2 for Procurement of Solar Power under Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 for 147 MW from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Co. Limited (MSEDCL) against Tariff based Competitive Bid invited by (MSEDCL) for setting up of grid connecting solar power projects at multiple locations in state of Maharashtra.

data.caption: Letter Of Intent For Procurement Of Solar Power Under Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 For 190 MW.
data.news_body: With reference to the above captioned subject and pursuant to the Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has received a Letter of Intent under Lot # 1 MSKVY 2.0/ROUND 1 for Procurement of Solar Power under Mukhyamantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0 For 190 MW from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Co. Limited (MSEDCL) against Tariff based Competitive Bid invited by (MSEDCL) for setting up of grid connecting solar power projects at multiple locations in state of Maharashtra.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III Part A Para A of the SEBI Listing Regulations We wish to inform you that the Notice of 23rd AGM and Annual Report of the Company for the FY 2024-25 has been sent on September 04 2025 via e-mail to all the Members whose email IDs are registered with the Company/ MUFG Intime India Private Limited Registrar and Transfer Agent/ Depository Participant(s) as on August 22 2025.  

Further please find enclosed copies of the advertisement published today in the Financial Express (English) and Daily Suraj (Ludhiana) newspapers regarding the intimation of the 23rd AGM and e-voting information.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform that Ceigall India Limited has been conferred with the CONSTRUCTION WORLD GLOBAL AWARD 2025 as the Fastest Growing Construction Company (Medium Category) on September 3 2025.

The award has been instituted by Construction World an industry body recognizing excellence in the infrastructure and construction sector.

Request you to kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting (BRSR)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 34(2)(f) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are submitting herewith the Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report for Financial Year 2024-25 which is also forms part of the Annual Report 2024-25.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 34(1) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed Annual Report of the Company including the Notice of the 23rd Annual General Meeting of the Company and other Statutory Reports for FY 2024-25.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed Notice along with Explanatory Statements of the 23rd Annual General Meeting of the Company to be held on Monday September 29 2025 at 02.30 P.M. (IST) through Video Conferencing (VC) / Other Audio Visual Means (OAVM).

data.caption: Intimation For Dispatch Of Letter To Shareholders Whose E-Mail Addresses Are Not Registered With Company/Registrar & Transfer Agent/Depository Participants.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 36(1)(b) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed copy of letter sent to the shareholders (whose e-mail addresses are not registered with Company/Registrar & Transfer Agent/Depository Participants) providing the weblink of websites and the Quick Response code from where the Annual Report including the Notice of 23rd Annual General Meeting for FY 2024-25 can be accessed.

data.caption: Intimation Of Book Closure
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 42 of Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 the Register of Members and Share Transfer Books of the Company shall remain closed From Tuesday 23rd September 2025 to Monday 29th September 2025 (both days inclusive) for taking record of the Members of the Company for the purpose of 23rd Annual General Meeting of the Company scheduled to be held Monday 29th September 2025 at 02:30 P.M.

data.news_body:

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Today I.E. February 04 2025
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated January 21 2025 and in terms of Regulation 30 & 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 [SEBI (LODR)] please be informed that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. February 04 2025 inter alia transacted the following businesses: -1. Considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the Limited Review Reports issued by M/s. B D Bansal Chartered Accountants Statutory Auditors of the Company for the Quarter and nine months ended December 31 2024 which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee. -Financial Results attached as Annexure - A

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 and further to our letter dated November 05 2024, and November 08 2024, Regarding Investor call scheduled at November 08, 2024, at 03:00 PM IST.The Transcript of the Earnings Call with the Analysts and Institutional Investors on the Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2024, held on 08.11.2024 is attached.The above-mentioned transcript is also available on the website of the Company at https://ceigall.com/regulation-46-of-sebi-lodr/

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated November 05th  2024 intimating the schedule of Investor call at November  08th  2024 at 03:00 PM IST,  we wish to inform you that the audio recording of the earnings conference call held today to discuss the unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter ended September 30th  2024 is available on the website of the Company and can be accessed on the following link: ceigall.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/16.Earnings-Conference-Call-Audio.mp3

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Provisions of Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Investor Presentation on the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30th, 2024.

data.caption: Financial Results For The September Quarter Ended 2024
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated October 26, 2024 and in terms of Regulation 30 & 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 [SEBI (LODR)] , please be informed that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e., November 05, 2024, inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results along with the Limited Review Reports issued by M/s. B D Bansal, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company for the quarter and half year ended  September 30, 2024, which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee. The meeting of the Board commenced at 12:30 p.m. and concluded at 02:30 p.m.

data.caption: Submission Of The Un-Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended June 30Th, 2024
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provision of  Regulation 30 read with Regulation 33 and other applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of Ceigall India Limited ('the Company') at their meeting held on August 26, 2024 at 02:45 pm at the corporate office of the company at Plot No. 452, Udyog Vihar Phase-5, Near GPO Gurugram, Behind Enkay Tower, Gurugram- 122016 and concluded at 04:30 pm, has approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the Quarter ended June 30th, 2024 along with Limited Review Reports of the Auditor for the corresponding period.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter dated August 26, 2024 and pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, enclosed herewith is the transcript of the audio recording of the call with analysts and institutional investors held on Thursday, 29th August 2024 on the unaudited financial results (consolidated and standalone) of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated August 26th 2024 intimating the schedule of Investor call at August 29th 2024 at 04:30 pm IST,  we wish to inform you that the audio recording of the Investor conference call held today to discuss the unaudited financial results (consolidated and standalone) of the Company for the quarter ended June 30th 2024 is available on the website of the Company and can be accessed on the following link:https://ceigall.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/WhatsApp-Audio-2024-08-29-at-7.52.58-PM-online-audio-converter.com_.mp3The presentation made to the analysts and institutional investors is also available on the website of the Company at : https://ceigall.com/other-compliance

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Investor Presentation on the Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2024. The above information is also being uploaded on the Company''s website at www.ceigall.com.
